description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince: Right Now I Can't Even Do One Sit-up, but I'll Try to Lose Weight and Save the World

altTitles.ja: 転生先が残念王子だった件 ～今は腹筋１回もできないけど痩せて異世界救います～

Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin Ikkai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince～I can't do a single sit-up now, but I'm going to lose weight and save another world～

description.en:
A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god.   
  
However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god? This is the story of the Pig Prince's struggle to lose weight!  
  


---
description.id:
Seorang pemuda yang mengalami kecelakaan pesawat saat pulang dari perjalan binis di luar negeri direinkarnasi ke dunia lain setelah diminta oleh dewi untuk mengalahkan dewa jahat.   
  
Akan tetapi, ia tereinkarnasi sebagai seorang pangeran bodoh. yang terkenal di kalangan ningrat dengan julukan "Pangeran Orc/Pangeran Babi" karena penampilannya yang gendut dan jelek. Sit-up saja tidak bisa, apalagi mengalahkan dewa jahat? Inilah kisah perjuangan si Pangeran Babi dalam menurunkan berat badan!

altTitles.ja: 村井の恋

description.en:
Murai, a high school boy who is acting strangely, confesses his feelings to Tanaka-sensei, an Otome game geek, but is kicked out. The next day, Murai, who has a new haircut, looks a lot like Tanaka's "favorite character"...?!

---
Placed 2nd in the webcomic section of the 2019 Tsugimanga awards.

altTitles.ja: 推しと出会いたくない女子大生

description.en: The story follows Mai, a college student, who joins a light music club because of her crush, the bass player and distributor Single Mambo. However, she meets Mitsui, her classmate, who is also a fan! She doesn't want to get close to him and doesn't want to be revealed as a fan, but for some reason, Mitsui is getting closer and closer to her...?

altTitles.ja: 異世界居酒屋｢げん｣

description.en:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  
After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom...   
Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. all visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes...  
A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
description.ja: 『異世界居酒屋「のぶ」』の作者・蝉川夏哉による原作書き下ろしのスピンオフ作品。次なる世界は異世界・東王国、王都パリシィア!王都パリシィアでも、異世界の住人たちは、初めて見る日本の居酒屋料理に戸惑いながらも舌鼓を打ち……。

altTitles.ja: 伝書鳥の王女様

description.en:
Zelle, the eighth royal princess of Roymonde, who was driven to the brink of defeat in the war. She was kidnapped by the enemy, and when she woke up... She became a bird?!

Fortunately or unfortunately, as the messenger bird of Commander-in-Chief, Valhayle! She struggles for her country even though she is in a bird’s body.

But you can't even do as much as treat me like a bird!!

---
After losing consciousness while fleeing the war raging in Roymund Kingdom, Princess Zeline wakes up in the body of a messenger falcon! She’s now the bird in charge of delivering information for Commander Valhyle and his army, who are searching for the remaining royal descendants. She may be tiny and feathered, but Zeline is determined to use her missions to find out what happened to her family. Can this little birdie gain the skeptical commander’s trust and give her kingdom new wings?

---

description.id:
Seingatku terakhir kali aku tertangkap oleh pasukan musuh saat berusaha melarikan diri.
Padahal aku tidak memiliki ingatan mati, tapi aneh sekali tiba-tiba aku terbangun menjadi seekor elang di markas militer negaraku sendiri. Bagaimana nasib saudara-saudaraku yang sama-sama lari menyelamatkan diri dari serangan musuh?
Satu-satunya cara agar aku bisa mendapatkan informasi adalah dengan tetap berada di dekat Rumares Balhail, panglima kejam ini. Tapi permasalahannya sekarang adalah aku sekarang seekor burung! tidak ada yang bisa kulakukan selain membantu membawakan pesan pada pasukan sekutu sekaligus mencari keberadaan saudara-saudaraku.
Aku harap mereka masih hidup agar kami bisa lebih mudah membangkitkan negara kami sendiri! Aku akan melakukan apa pun asal itu demi negaraku!

---

戦争で敗北に追い込まれたロイモンド王国の第８王女ゼルイネ。 敵に捕まり目を覚ますと...鳥になっていた!? それも幸か不幸か、味方の総司令官・バルハイルの伝書鳥に！ 鳥の姿になっても、国の復興のために手を尽くす彼女だが… 鳥扱いするのはもうやめてー！ 「クエエエッ!!」

description.ko:
전쟁으로 패망 직전에 몰린 로이몬드의 여덟 번째 왕녀 제르.
적군에게 납치됐다 깨어나 보니… 새가 됐다?!

다행인지 불행인지 그것도 총사령관 ‘발하일’의 전령새가!
비록 새의 몸이지만 나라를 위해 고군분투하는 그녀.

하지만 진짜 새 취급도 정도껏 하라고!!
“궤에에엑!"

description.uk:
Зелле, восьма королівська принцеса Роймонда, яка була доведена до межі поразки у війні. Її викрав ворог, а коли вона прокинулася… Стала птахом?! На щастя чи на жаль, як птах-вісник Головнокомандувача, Валхайла! Вона бореться за свою країну, навіть перебуваючи в тілі птаха. Але ви не можете навіть ставитися до мене, як до птаха!! "Гвіккк!"

description.en: A story of two close friends living together.
description.ja:
友達と二人暮らしをしています。

玲奈と由奈はルームシェアする友達同士。専門学校の寮で同室だったことをきっかけに、卒業後もかれこれ5年一緒に暮らしている。ある日、由奈が拾ってきた猫をきっかけに二人の関係に変化が…！？

description.ja: 美人だけど学校一『カタブツ』だと噂の女子に勇気を出して告白すると…!?

description.en:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
description.ja: キレイ好きで真面目で平凡な女子高生・清田澄子。ある日、昼食を食べていると学園いちの美少女・白河ユキにパンをかじられる。その日を境に二人の距離は急接近！　体操着を借りたり、相合傘をしたり、潔癖な清田さんに次々と試練が襲いかかる。「もしかして白河さん、私を汚そうとしている？」　清田さんの妄想はエスカレートしていくが…!?

altTitles.ja: 異世界美少女受肉おじさんと
異世界（ファンタジー）美少女受肉おじさんと
ファ美肉

With a Fogie Reincarnated as a Pretty Fantasy Girl

altTitles.ru: Фантастический мир с обращённым в красавицу мужчиной и…

description.en:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However… will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?  
  
"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!
description.ru: Скучный мужчина вместе с его красивым лучшим другом были призваны в другой мир обнаженной богиней! Однако из-за озорства богини одного превратили в... невероятно красивую девушку?! Чтобы обратно вернуть своё тело, они должны отправиться в путешествие, чтобы победить Короля Демонов!! Да пускай начнётся романтическая комедия, наполненная полным безумием иного мира!
description.pt-br:
Hinata Tachibana, um trabalhador de escritório sitiado de 32 anos, e seu belo melhor amigo Tsukasa Jinguuji foram convocados para outro mundo por uma deusa nua. No entanto, por causa das travessuras da deusa, Tachibana foi transformada em uma garota bonita inigualável ?! Para recuperar seu corpo, ele tem que viajar com seu melhor amigo para derrotar o rei demônio !! 

No entanto... eles serão capazes de manter as mãos longe um do outro !? 

"Um homem mais velho que se tornou uma garota bonita" e "Um homem mais velho e bonito"! Deixe a loucura outra jornada mundial rom-com começar!!

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: The mysterious murderers who commit crimes frequently hide in the dark and stalk their prey silently! They may also stroll past innocent passers-by indifferently… or put up a kind smile, but wave a butcher's knife at the next moment! There's another possibility that… You're that demon…

title.en: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru

altTitles.ru: Неразумный ангел в пляске с демонами | Неразумный ангел в танце с демоном

altTitles.ja: 愚かな天使は悪魔と踊る

altTitles.vi: Thiên sứ Ngu muội Nhảy múa cùng Ác ma
天使愚眛趂𦨂共恶魔 (Nom Script)

altTitles.en: The Foolish Angel Dances with the Devil

description.en: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
description.ja: 堕落した悪魔たちにやる気を出させるため悪魔たちのアイドルとなる人間を捜しに人間界に降りてきた阿久津雅虎。彼は早くもアイドル候補・天音リリーを見つけ勧誘する。しかし、リリーの正体は阿久津たち悪魔の天敵の「天使」で!? 自らの身と仲間を守るためリリーを堕天させんとする阿久津と野望のため阿久津の更正を決意する
description.pt: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe - todo o caminho desde o Inferno, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!
description.pt-br: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe -todo o caminho desde o Infernio, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!

description.en:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

altTitles.ja: ギミック！

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

altTitles.ja: 堕落家族論

description.en: Ririko passed away, leaving behind her young daughter, Meguru, and a will. In the will she states that Meguru should get to know both Touma and Sentarou, then choose which one she wants to be her father. Now, a young Meguru has to live together with the squabbling duo for the next 3 months. Who will she choose to be her papa?!

altTitles.ja: 極東ネクロマンス

description.en: One day, Kaoru Uno suddenly starts seeing mysterious monsters known as shiryo or death spirits. With the arrival of his late father's coworker Yoji Amane and a special ring his father gave him, Kaoru is ushered into the world of necromancers! From the creator of Aliens Area comes a fantastic new series of necromancer battles!

altTitles.ja: 濾過する私

description.en: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world — Lin Kai — visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...
description.fr: Dans un coin de la ville se trouve une boutique, en apparence normale, nommée le "Time Photo Studio". Les propriétaires de la boutique, Cheng Xiaoshi et Lu Guang, peuvent voyager dans le temps au travers de photos. Un jour, une étoile montante de l'opéra chinois, Lin Kai, visite leur studio et leur demande de trouver un enregistrement datant d'il y a 10 ans. Ils n'ont qu'une seule photo et qu'une chance...
description.zh: 在城市的某个角落，有一家看似普通的小店——时光照相馆。店主程小时和陆光可以通过照片，进入过去的时空。有一天，戏曲界新锐林凯来到了照相馆，委托程小时与陆光，寻找一份10年前的影像。照片只有1张，机会只有1次……

description.en:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.en: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama o Horesasetai!

altTitles.ja: 崖っぷち令嬢は黒騎士様を惚れさせたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama wo Horesasetai!

altTitles.es-la: ¡Quiero hacer que el Caballero Oscuro se Enamore de mi!

altTitles.en: I Want to Make Black-Knight Fall In Love With Me!

altTitles.pl: Chcę, żeby Czarny Rycerz Się We Mnie Zakochał

altTitles.en: A Noblewoman on the Brink of Disaster Wants to Make the Black Knight Fall in Love!

description.en: My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment... The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared Black-Knight in the kingdom, Frost, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands". In an attempt to secure the fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black-Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...
description.ja: 実家は借金まみれ、病気の妹を救うには治療費が足りない…。崖っぷちな子爵令嬢・クラリスが政略結婚をすることになったのは、「魔物を素手で屠る」とウワサの黒騎士・フロストだった！財産を握るため、どうにか”黒騎士様”を篭絡しようとした矢先、クラリスは“彼女”の秘密を知ってしまい…。
description.pl:
Moja rodzina jest zadłużona i nie mamy pieniędzy na leczenie chorej siostry...
Zmartwiona szlachcianka, Clarice, zostaje zaangażowana w polityczne małżeństwo z najbardziej przerażającym Czarnym Rycerzem w królestwie, Frostem, znanym z „zabijania bestii gołymi rękami”.
Chcąc zapewnić sobie fortunę, Clarice próbuje uwieść „Czarnego Rycerza”, ale gdy to robi, odkrywa „jej” sekret...
description.es-la:
Mi familia está endeudada, y no tenemos suficiente dinero para el tratamiento de mi hermana enferma...
La nobleza en apuros, Clarice, se encuentra comprometida en un matrimonio político con el Caballero Oscuro más temido del reino, Frost, quien es conocido por "matar bestias con sus propias manos"
Con la intención de asegurar la fortuna, Clarice intenta seducir al "Caballero Oscuro", pero justo cuando lo hace, descubre el secreto de "ella"...

title.en: My Trainee Teacher Is Actually a Goth Rocker

altTitles.vi: Cô giáo thực tập của tôi thực ra là 1 Goth Rocker

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la sirvienta del protagonista de un juego de terror

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

altTitles.ja: ダークギャザリング

description.en: Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.
description.vi: Keitarou, chàng trai có khả năng thu hút ma quỷ, được thuê làm gia sư cho một cô bé mang tên gọi Yayoi, người có thể trông thấy ma quỷ và đang trong công cuộc tìm kiếm con ma đã mang người mẹ của mình đi mất.

altTitles.ja: ××しないで！月峰さん。

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

altTitles.ja: 東京ガールズブラボー

description.en:
This is a story of "love" and "friendship" encountered by Kaneda Sakae, a high school student who came to Tokyo from Hokkaido in search of "fashion" in the early 1980s.

This is a realistic "subculture" coming-of-age story that blows away the pretense of the bubble economy and bustle of the 1980s.

A dialogue with Asada Akira is also included at the end of the second volume!

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

altTitles.ja: みょーちゃん先生はかく語りき

description.en: Sasafune Miyoko, the nurse at a certain high school, is often asked for advice by the students. Almost every day someone comes to ask her about their worries, and this and that… But since these are high school students going through puberty, helping them is usually not that simple! Myō-chan-sensei is hard at work answering questions that are sure to make you blush like "Have you ever had sex outdoors?" or "I wonder which panties my boyfriend likes more".
description.ja:
生徒のためならなんでもシちゃう？熱血ポンコツ教師・みょーちゃん登場☆

とある高校の保健室の先生・笹舟みよかは生徒達の良き相談役として、今日も思春期爆発系質問にカラダを張って答えます！アオカンしたいって彼氏に言われた？ 乳輪が大きいのが悩み？全部みょーちゃん先生にお任せあれ！！！
description.ru: К Сасафунэ Миёко, медсестре одной средней школы, часто обращаются ученики за советом. Почти каждый день кто-нибудь приходит спросить ее о своих проблемах, о том, о сем... Но поскольку речь идет о старшеклассниках, переживающих период полового созревания, помочь им обычно не так-то просто! Мио-тян-сэнсэй усердно отвечает на вопросы, которые наверняка заставят вас покраснеть, например: «Занимались ли вы когда-нибудь сексом на улице?» или «Интересно, какие трусики больше нравятся моему парню?».

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد

description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: Ainosenbiki ~Mama Katsu Shitara Mama ga Dekita Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: アイノセンビキ ～ママ活したらママができた話～

altTitles.en: Ainosenbiki: A Story of Getting a Mommy After Doing Sugar Mama Dating

description.en: The protagonist ​​is a middle school boy named Hikawa Jun who lost his mother at birth. He glares at his classmates who complain about their own overprotective mothers and wonders what it would be like if he had a mother of his own. The story begins when Jun, who wants the warmth of a mother, lies about his age and matches up with a stranger on a sugar mama dating app.
description.es-la: La historia de cómo conseguí una mamá con una Sugar Mommy, Jun Hikawa, es un chico de secundaria que perdió a su madre al nacer. Mientras miraba con enojo a sus compañeros que se quejaban de sus madres sobreprotectoras, Jun soñaba con cómo sería tener una madre. La historia comienza cuando Jun, en su búsqueda del calor maternal, miente sobre su edad y se conecta con una mujer desconocida en una aplicación de Sugar mommy.

altTitles.ja: ムシバミヒメ

description.en: In Toshiya Higashimoto's latest work Ai Tanaka, college student who wants to be a novelist, decides to share a room with Miu Yamaguchi who she met on the internet. Keep an your eyes on the roommates in this psychological horror.
description.ja: 【『テセウスの船』東元俊哉最新作！】小説家志望の大学生・田中愛は、募集サイトで知り合った山口美羽とルームシェアすることにしたのだが――。目が離せない、同居人サイコホラー。

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la: No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. ¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

description.en:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.ja: アストロベイビー

description.en: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?

Seol, a former member of the crime organization Misangpa, starts a new life as "Snow" in the "Black Suit Gang," led by Yong, after their reunion in prison. Despite his delicate appearance, Seol has no interest in the world around him, and Handsome, who is fixated on him, is nothing more than an annoying presence. For over a year, the "Black Suit Gang" effortlessly evades police pursuit and thrives. When Yong brings information about a target, they decide to rob a small bank in a rural area. What should have been a simple job takes an unexpected turn when the team suddenly stops communicating. Seol soon discovers Handsome's true identity hidden within the vault, where a chaebol's slush fund is supposedly kept...

A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

description.en:
Yua became my sister through our parents' remarriage. She's incredibly cute and adores me...

But sometimes, the expressions she shows...
description.vi:
Yua là em gái kế của tôi khi bố mẹ chúng tôi tái hôn với nhau.

Em ấy rất là dễ thương và quý tôi lắm luôn. Nhưng có gì đó cứ là lạ.
